attributes.action: prioritise the criminalisation of  the date-rape chemical GBL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
GBL can cause seizures, blackouts and even death and has been banned in the USA. But shockingly it is still legal and readily available in the UK.

GBL became popular after it was discovered it had the same effects of as GHB, banned in 2003. Low doses are used recreationally by clubbers, but when this colourless, odourless chemical is mixed with alcohol or taken in high doses, it leads to terrifying blackouts - making it the ideal spiking substance for sex attackers.

The Government has announced plans to look into whether this chemical should be criminalised. But this process could take several years– leaving hundreds more women at risk of date-rape attacks.

If you believe they should make this a priority, add your name to this petition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
